name: places/ChIJKZYzhe9YwokRh8yNVLP161M
formattedAddress: 521 Park Ave #1, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 521 Park Ave #1, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Schildhorn is my hero! My bad luck was that I fell in Manhattan and got a severe (trimalleolar) ankle fracture 4 months ago. My great luck was that Dr. Schildhorn squeezed me in the very next day  at Lennox Hill Hospital. Dr. Schildhorn is a brilliant surgeon who did wonders in reconstituting my ankle to the point of where I can walk with a cane now. And most amazingly, he has the kindest, most caring, pleasant personality which contributes so much to the healing process.

originalText.text:
I have been a patient of Dr. Schildhorn‚Äôs for many years; he has seen me through all of my sports injuries (complex right hand fracture, sprains, stress fracture in my hip, labral tear, and complete ACL reconstruction on my right knee, this year.) I would give him and his office 10 stars if I could.

Dr.S is a phenomenal surgeon &  a wonderful person. His office is understanding and patient ‚Äî if I have any concerns they get back to me ASAP and go above and beyond to make sure I‚Äôm comfortable. Best of all, Dr.S knows when surgery is the best route vs PT or occupational therapy. His recommendations have always led to the best results & his recovery timelines are realistic and accurate.

I recommend him to any and everyone who needs orthopedic treatment, especially athletes as I‚Äôm back to fighting shape. Thank you Dr. S, Irina, Jennifer, and All ! :)

originalText.text:
Dr. Schildhorn is an amazing Orthopedic surgeon!! I highly recommend him to patients and friends alike, and I know they will be in great hands. He is kind, attentive to detail and does whatever he can to help those in need.
Dr. Schildhorn is extremely personable and caring, and will go above and beyond to make sure you are feeling better :-)

originalText.text:
Dr Schildhorn is an amazing doctor who has been seeing my son for the past 3 months and I must say I am so thankful for having such a great doctor who is caring, knowledgeable and understanding. My son had a broken humerus and thanks to him sending us for a doppler test we found out my son had thyroid cancer after getting and his biopsy back we were having surgery within weeks and i can say now thank God for him breaking that arm ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èlol.
His office is very clean, well kept and most importantly wait times are minimal and I felt very safe coming in during COVID. His staff is great and always help get me in at a good time with me having to work around my schedule. I would highly recommend him to everyone I know and especially my family and now I have a great doctor to recommend to any of the patients who come into my office. I would give 10 stars if I could! Thank you for all that you do!

originalText.text: I cannot say enough wonderful things about Dr. Schildhorn. I booked an appointment with him due to a chronic hamstring injury and he provided exceptional care. It was very clear during our initial consult how extensive his knowledge was; he properly diagnosed my injury and suggested rehabilitation exercises I could do before even receiving my MRI results. His bedside manner is the best I've experienced - he's extremely warm and has a great sense of humor. I highly recommend him!
